instruction: Suggest a creative and engaging activity that could be done with a group of elementary school children.
output: A creative and engaging activity that could be done with a group of elementary school children is a scavenger hunt. Give the children a list of items or clues to find and set them off on an exciting adventure of exploration as they search for the items. At the end of the scavenger hunt, they can come together and share what they have found with each other.
